divs: sighting detailswas listening to coast to coast, and george mentioned that someone had just reported a fireball over michigan, i took the dog out to do her business and within 3 min. a fireball appeared directly overhead going north\east lasted about three seconds.....didn't look anything like any falling star i ever saw this had a definite fire as a con-trail
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hartford
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
